candidates.title: Is Emma Watson Retiring from Acting?
candidates.content:
Claim:
Emma Watson announced she was retiring from acting in February 2021.
Rating:
False
About this rating
"Harry Potter" star Emma Watson became the subject of internet rumors in February 2021 as fans noticed that her social media accounts were dormant since mid-2020.
On Feb. 20, 2021, Daily Mail reported Watson was stepping back from acting to spend time with her partner, resulting in thousands of her fans tweeting about her retirement.
Although Daily Mail cited Watson’s "agent" as the source of the news and quoted an unnamed publicist who reportedly said Watson's career is "dormant" and she "is not taking on new commitments," other news outlets immediately reached out to the actor’s team to fact-check and learned that the rumor is false.
Jason Weinberg, Watson's manager at Untitled Entertainment, told Entertainment Weekly that "Emma's social media accounts are dormant but her career isn't.”
Given that the rumor was swiftly debunked by Watson’s team, we rate this claim as “False.”
candidates.description: The actor’s dormant social media accounts led to speculation online.

result.explanation: This assessment is evidence-based. The news caption accurately reflects the Daily Mail's reporting on February 20, 2021, regarding Emma Watson. Snopes fact-check confirms the Daily Mail report was based on unconfirmed rumors, and Watson's representatives explicitly denied she was retiring.  The caption accurately reports the Daily Mail story but fails to accurately reflect the subsequent debunking of the retirement claim.
